description:
Love my life, love my sweet heart. Let’s Finger Trouble together!!  SUPER GAME BOX  coming now--Multiplayer Game--(17 IN 1) ----We will update the game continually.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Are you still unhappy about the inability to enjoy the fun of games together with your friends? Do you still click on the screen alone and joylessly? With Finger Trouble, everything is going to change! It will bring you an unprecedented interactive experience. From now on, your opponent is no longer a cold AI (Artificial Intelligence). Playing this game with your friends brings you more than the thrill of the game.

*Two different challenge modes

-Direct Mode
You can play your favorite games or the games you are good at with your friends to decide who is the real good player.

-Random Mode
In order to prove that you don’t win by sheer luck, you can choose to play in random mode to convince your opponent.

*6 different types of games

-Quick Click Series 
Have a try to find whose fingers are more flexible. It is no use just bragging about it.

-Quick Response Series
Have a try to find whose nerves are more responsive. There might be a superman among your friends.

-Quick Eye Series 
Have a try to find whose eyes are quicker. Are you that dim-sighted?

-Quick Finger Series 
Quickness is not enough. You will still lose the game if you click on a wrong target. Get your eyes and fingers to work together.

-Rhythmic Click
I am not only better at rhyming. I am better at everything. Come prove yourself.

-Coordination Task 
We are both opponents and partners. Lets enjoy the game together!
